root.name: Space Invaders Get Even
root.description: OverviewSpace Invaders Get Even released was released on the WiiWare channel for 500 Wii Points. Although the game was originally planned for a retail release, it was finally released as a downloadable game. Although the original game only costs 500 Wii Points, there are three expansion packs with new levels. Each cost 500 Wii Points.GameplayIn an interesting twist on the original game, Space Invaders Get Even has the player controlling the extraterrestrial antagonists. The aliens want revenge on the destructive forces of the humans! The player will use the Wiimote and Nunchuck to navigate and dispatch your extraterrestrial soldiers in order to wreak havoc on the Earthlings. Get high scores and upload them through Nintendo Wi-Fi Connection to online leaderboards.
